name: Mr Climb
description:
Avoid obstacles, collect coins and DO NOT touch the lava. The floor is lava!
Try to climb to the top of the mountain. How far can you get?

To Play: Tap when the Hook is Aimed!

Features:
• Easy to Learn Fun to Master
• Hard to Master, also!
• Brain crushing traps
• Fluid Graphics
• Low File Size
• Action Packed Soundtrack
• NO ADS
